001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import java.util.List;
005import org.openqa.selenium.By;
006import org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor;
007import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
008import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
009
010/**
011 * Utility class for handling iframe-related operations within a Selenium WebDriver instance.
012 *
013 * <p>This class provides methods to search for elements inside iframes when they are not found in the main DOM.
014 * </p>
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public class FrameHelper {
019
020   private FrameHelper() {
021   }
022
023   /**
024    * Searches for a WebElement inside iframes using a given locator.
025    *
026    * @param driver The WebDriver instance.
027    * @param by     The locator of the target element.
028    * @return A {@link SmartWebElement} if found, otherwise {@code null}.
029    */
030   public static SmartWebElement findElementInIframes(WebDriver driver, By by) {
031      driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
032      return searchElementInIframes(driver, by);
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Searches for a WebElement inside iframes using an existing WebElement reference.
037    *
038    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
039    * @param element The reference WebElement to find inside an iframe.
040    * @return A {@link SmartWebElement} if found, otherwise {@code null}.
041    */
042   public static SmartWebElement findElementInIframes(WebDriver driver, WebElement element) {
043      driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
044      return searchElementInIframesByElement(driver, element);
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Searches for a WebElement inside available iframes using a locator.
049    *
050    * @param driver The WebDriver instance.
051    * @param by     The locator of the target element.
052    * @return A {@link SmartWebElement} if found, otherwise {@code null}.
053    */
054   private static SmartWebElement searchElementInIframes(WebDriver driver, By by) {
055      List<WebElement> elements = driver.findElements(by);
056      if (!elements.isEmpty()) {
057         return new SmartWebElement(elements.get(0), driver);
058      }
059
060      List<WebElement> frames = getAllIframes(driver);
061      for (WebElement frame : frames) {
062         driver.switchTo().frame(frame);
063         elements = driver.findElements(by);
064         if (!elements.isEmpty()) {
065            return new SmartWebElement(elements.get(0), driver);
066         } else {
067            driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
068         }
069      }
070
071      return null;
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Searches for an iframe that contains a WebElement matching the given locator.
076    *
077    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
078    * @param locator The locator of the target element to find within iframes.
079    * @return The containing {@link WebElement} (iframe) if found, otherwise {@code null}.
080    */
081   public static WebElement findContainerIframe(WebDriver driver, By locator) {
082      List<WebElement> frames = getAllIframes(driver);
083      for (WebElement frame : frames) {
084         driver.switchTo().frame(frame);
085         if (!driver.findElements(locator).isEmpty()) {
086            return frame;
087         }
088         driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
089      }
090
091      return null;
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Searches for an existing WebElement inside available iframes.
096    *
097    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
098    * @param element The reference WebElement to locate inside an iframe.
099    * @return A {@link SmartWebElement} if found, otherwise {@code null}.
100    */
101   private static SmartWebElement searchElementInIframesByElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element) {
102      List<WebElement> frames = getAllIframes(driver);
103      for (WebElement frame : frames) {
104         driver.switchTo().frame(frame);
105         try {
106            WebElement foundElement = locateElementByAttributes(driver, element);
107            if (foundElement != null) {
108               return new SmartWebElement(foundElement, driver);
109            }
110         } catch (Exception e) {
111            driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
112         }
113      }
114
115      return null;
116   }
117
118   /**
119    * Attempts to locate an element by matching its tag name and unique attributes.
120    *
121    * @param driver          The WebDriver instance.
122    * @param originalElement The reference WebElement to match.
123    * @return A WebElement if found, otherwise {@code null}.
124    */
125   private static WebElement locateElementByAttributes(WebDriver driver, WebElement originalElement) {
126      String tagName = originalElement.getTagName();
127      String attributes = getUniqueAttributes(driver, originalElement);
128
129      @SuppressWarnings("java:S1075")
130      String xpathExpression = "//" + tagName + attributes;
131      List<WebElement> matchingElements = driver.findElements(By.xpath(xpathExpression));
132
133      for (WebElement el : matchingElements) {
134         if (el.getText().equals(originalElement.getText())) {
135            return el;
136         }
137      }
138      return null;
139   }
140
141   /**
142    * Extracts unique attributes from a WebElement for use in locating it later.
143    *
144    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
145    * @param element The target WebElement.
146    * @return A string representation of the element's attributes in XPath format.
147    */
148   private static String getUniqueAttributes(WebDriver driver, WebElement element) {
149      JavascriptExecutor js = (JavascriptExecutor) driver;
150      String script =
151            "var attrs = arguments[0].attributes, result = ''; "
152                  + "for (var i = 0; i < attrs.length; i++) { "
153                  + "    if (attrs[i].name !== 'style') { "
154                  + "        result += '[@' + attrs[i].name + '=\"' + attrs[i].value + '\"]'; "
155                  + "    } "
156                  + "} return result;";
157
158      return (String) js.executeScript(script, element);
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Retrieves all iframe elements from the current page.
163    *
164    * @param driver The WebDriver instance.
165    * @return A list of iframe WebElements.
166    */
167   private static List<WebElement> getAllIframes(WebDriver driver) {
168      JavascriptExecutor js = (JavascriptExecutor) driver;
169      return (List<WebElement>) js.executeScript(
170            "return Array.from(document.getElementsByTagName('iframe'));"
171      );
172   }
173}
